tasks.label: Build, Package and Install Extension
args: rm -f ${workspaceFolder}/*.vsix && npx vsce package && code --install-extension $(ls -t ${workspaceFolder}/*.vsix | head -n1)

Remove-Item -Force "${workspaceFolder}\*.vsix"; npx vsce package; $latest = Get-ChildItem "${workspaceFolder}" -Filter *.vsix | Sort-Object LastWriteTime -Descending | Select-Object -First 1; code --install-extension $latest.FullName
